Package net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.trigger

This package contains all the classes that react to game events.
See Also:
for more about reacting to game events.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Trigger
    Triggers respond to GameEvent objects that are raised by various GameLogic methods, implementing cards that do something when something else happens.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCardTrigger
    The base class for triggers that fire off card-adjacent effects.
    AbstractSummonTrigger  
    AfterCardPlayedTrigger  
    AfterDamagingSpellCastedTrigger  
    AfterMinionPlayedTrigger  
    AfterMinionSummonedTrigger

    AttributeAppliedTrigger  
    BattlecryResolvedTrigger  
    BeforeMinionPlayedTrigger  
    BeforeMinionSummonedTrigger  
    BoardChangedTrigger  
    BuffEnchantment  
    CardAddedToDeckTrigger
    Fires whenever a card is added to the deck via a GameLogic.shuffleToDeck(Player, Card) or GameLogic.insertIntoDeck(Player, Card, int) effect.
    CardDrawnTrigger  
    CardPlayedTrigger  
    CardReceivedTrigger

    DidEndSequenceTrigger  
    DiscardTrigger  
    DiscoverTrigger  
    DrainTrigger  
    Enchantment
    An enchantment is a type of entity that reacts to certain events using a trigger by casting a spell.
    EnrageChangedTrigger  
    EventTrigger
    This is the base class of all effects that react to events in the game.
    FatalDamageTrigger  
    FatigueTrigger  
    GameStartTrigger  
    GameStateChangedTrigger  
    HealingTrigger  
    HeroPowerUsedTrigger  
    InspireTrigger  
    InvokedTrigger  
    LoseDeflectTrigger  
    LoseDivineShieldTrigger  
    LoseStealthTrigger  
    MaxHpIncreasedTrigger
    Fires whenever the matching entity's Attribute.MAX_HP is increased via the GameLogic.setHpAndMaxHp(Actor, int) effect.
    MaxManaChangedTrigger  
    MinionDeathTrigger
    A trigger that fires whenever a minion dies.
    MinionPlayedTrigger  
    MinionSummonedTrigger
    Fires whenever a minion is summoned.
    ModifyCurrentManaTrigger  
    NonDrainDamageReceivedTrigger  
    NonFatigueDamageCausedTrigger
    Triggers as damage caused only if the damage is not fatigue damage.
    NullTrigger  
    OverloadTrigger  
    PhysicalAttackTrigger  
    PreDamageTrigger  
    PreDeflectDamageTrigger
    Triggers as damage caused only if the damage is not fatigue damage.
    PreGameStartTrigger
    Fires before the game starts but after mulligans.
    QuestPlayedTrigger  
    QuestSuccessTrigger  
    ReturnToHandTrigger  
    RoastTrigger  
    SecretPlayedTrigger
    Fires when a secret is played from the hand.
    SecretRevealedTrigger  
    ShuffledOnlyOriginalCopiesTrigger  
    ShuffledTrigger  
    SilenceTrigger
    Fires whenever an Actor is Attribute.SILENCED.
    SpellCastedTrigger  
    SupremacyTrigger  
    TargetAcquisitionTrigger  
    TriggerManager
    The trigger manager contains the code for managing triggers and actually processing events' effects in the game.
    TurnEndTrigger  
    TurnStartTrigger  
    WeaponDestroyedTrigger  
    WeaponEquippedTrigger  
    WeaponPlayedTrigger  
    WhereverTheyAreEnchantment
    Represents an enchantment that affects a minion with the given cardId at construction time with whatever desc spell was provided, "wherever it is."
    WillEndSequenceTrigger
